parameters.metaDescription: A comma-separated list of <field>:<direction> pairs.

parameters.name: size
parameters.metaDescription: Defines the number of hits to return. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: query
parameters.metaDescription: Defines the search definition using the Query DSL. Learn more: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/7.x/query-dsl.html

parameters.name: unsafe
parameters.metaDescription: USE WITH CAUTION. When enabled, JavaScript is not executed in a sandboxed environment and all globals are available.

parameters.name: data
parameters.metaDescription: The value to apply as the `data` argument to the JavaScript code. For objects and arrays, `data` is passed by reference.

parameters.name: code
parameters.metaDescription: A JavaScript function body. Supports `await` and returning promises.

parameters.name: requestHeaders
parameters.metaDescription: The request headers are used to lookup the current users based on the current session cookie (VIDUSR).

parameters.name: getApiManagerUser
parameters.metaDescription: If set to false, the flow-node does not tries to lookup the user on the API-Manager. Set it to false, when for instance user authorization is disabled as there might be no belonging user configured in the API-Manager.
